results.t: Opera Web Browser | Faster, Safer, Smarter | Opera
results.p: Faster, safer and smarter than default browsers. Opera Browser is fully-featured for privacy, security, and everything you do online.
Opera is a multi-platform web browser developed by its namesake company Opera. The current edition of the browser is based on Chromium.

results.t: Opera browser with AI - Apps on Google Play
results.p: Fast, private and user-friendly, Opera Browser is built for security on the modern mobile internet. Enjoy Free VPN, Ad Blocker, and integrated AI, plus the ...

results.t: Opera: AI browser with VPN on the App Store - Apple
results.p: Fast, safe and private, Opera Browser is a beautifully designed web browser with a Red Dot Award for its stunning user interface.

results.t: Opera Mini: Fast Web Browser - Apps on Google Play
results.p: Opera Mini is a secure browser providing great privacy protection on the web. Use private tabs to secure private and incognito browsing without leaving a trace.
The Opera browser has some new tricks up its sleeve. Notable recent additions include a built-in VPN, an ad-blocker, and a battery-saver mode, all of which ...
Opera Browser is a potent combination of speed, security, and customizability, making it a strong contender in the continually evolving browser market.
